# Sergio Carrilho

Tech Lead @ Sony | Agile | AI | KMP

This is the personal website of Sergio Carrilho.

## Core Content

- [About](/about) - Professional bio, skills, and background.
- [Posts](/posts) - Articles on Software Engineering, Agile Leadership, and AI.
- [Talks](/talks) - Conference talks and presentations (slides/video).
- [External](/external) - Guest posts and external features.
